name: Black Water Lilies
description:
DESCRIPTION

Black Water Lilies presents a soft, serene pixelated landscape, encouraging you to observe intrusive or anxiety-induced thoughts without engaging in them. Drift your way through gentle puzzles and across platforms. For a brief moment, exist in this space and let go of the thoughts filling your head. 

KEY FEATURES 

- Exist in a strange yet soft environment

- Glide from platform to platform

- Reveal the path by completing simple puzzles

- Find comfort in guiding creatures to their homes

- Short, uncomplicated gameplay

DETAILS

Released: June 29, 2021

Platform: Windows

Price: Free of charge

Developer/ Artist: Reyna Balderstone

Music: "Art of Silence - by Uniq" is under a Creative Commons license (Creative Commons – International Recognition 4.0 – CC BY 4.0)
